Desc.entry: A fun and friendly Round Table group for men aged 18-45 years. From sports to arts, nights out at restaurants to family social events, the group prides itself on giving its members the chance to embrace life to the full. Members can benefit from taking part in debates and organising functions and events by building leadership skills and enhancing their public speaking abilities etc. The Round Table provides a great opportunity to help others and become more involved in the local community whilst having fun, meeting new people and enjoying new experiences.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various venues, usually alternate Thurs at 7.30pm, please contact for details
